segments.en: “Mendicants, there are these five powers of a female.
Attractiveness, wealth, relatives, children, and ethical behavior.

segments.pli: Rūpabalena ca, bhikkhave, mātugāmo samannāgato hoti, na ca sīlabalena, nāsenteva naṃ, kule na vāsenti.
segments.en: If a female has the power of attractiveness but not that of ethical behavior, the family will send her away, they won’t accommodate her.

segments.pli: Rūpabalena ca, bhikkhave, mātugāmo samannāgato hoti, bhogabalena ca, na ca sīlabalena, nāsenteva naṃ, kule na vāsenti.
segments.en: If a female has the powers of attractiveness and wealth but not that of ethical behavior, the family will send her away, they won’t accommodate her.

segments.pli: Rūpabalena ca, bhikkhave, mātugāmo samannāgato hoti, bhogabalena ca, ñātibalena ca, na ca sīlabalena, nāsenteva naṃ, kule na vāsenti.
segments.en: If a female has the powers of attractiveness, wealth, and relatives, but not that of ethical behavior, the family will send her away, they won’t accommodate her.

segments.pli: Rūpabalena ca, bhikkhave, mātugāmo samannāgato hoti, bhogabalena ca, ñātibalena ca, puttabalena ca, na ca sīlabalena, nāsenteva naṃ, kule na vāsenti.
segments.en: If a female has the powers of attractiveness, wealth, relatives, and children, but not that of ethical behavior, the family will send her away, they won’t accommodate her.

segments.pli: Sīlabalena ca, bhikkhave, mātugāmo samannāgato hoti, na ca rūpabalena, vāsenteva naṃ, kule na nāsenti.
segments.en: If a female has the power of ethical behavior but not that of attractiveness, the family will accommodate her, they won’t send her away.

segments.pli: Sīlabalena ca, bhikkhave, mātugāmo samannāgato hoti, na ca bhogabalena, vāsenteva naṃ, kule na nāsenti.
segments.en: If a female has the power of ethical behavior but not that of wealth, the family will accommodate her, they won’t send her away.

segments.pli: Sīlabalena ca, bhikkhave, mātugāmo samannāgato hoti, na ca ñātibalena, vāsenteva naṃ, kule na nāsenti.
segments.en: If a female has the power of ethical behavior but not that of relatives, the family will accommodate her, they won’t send her away.

segments.pli: Sīlabalena ca, bhikkhave, mātugāmo samannāgato hoti, na ca puttabalena, vāsenteva naṃ, kule na nāsenti.
segments.en: If a female has the power of ethical behavior but not that of children, the family will accommodate her, they won’t send her away.

segments.pli: Imāni kho, bhikkhave, pañca mātugāmassa balānī”ti.
segments.en: These are the five powers of a female.”

sections.title: “Mendicants, there are these five powers of a female.…

suttaplex.blurb: A woman lacking in any of the five powers may be expelled from a family.
